mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bfilename, bfiledata from boards order by bno desc
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bfilename, bfiledata, userid, username, userpassword, userage, useremail from boards b, users u where b.bwriter = u.userid and b.bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into boards (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bfilename, bfiledata) values( seq_boards_bno.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, sysdate, null, null )
